============
Data Sources
============

Source ERD
==========

1. Social - Social posts data across different themes
2. Search - Search Data on different channels
3. Sales - Weekly sales data for all products
4. Theme - Different theme with product lists
5. Manufacturer - Different vendors across all themes

Source validation rules
=======================

1. No. of theme per product
2. Date consistency

Source data summary
===================

Product sales data given with search and social post at theme level is given
